casper
Class Bullet 

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--casper.Bullet
public class Bullet
extends java.lang.Object

子弹类,处理子弹动画和碰撞.


Example:

Image img;

int[][][] subImage;

int x, y, width, height;

int sex;

Bullet b = new Bullet( img, subImage, x, y, width, height);

b.setPos(x,y);

b.setSex(sex);



Author: wangquan
Version: 1.0

Field Summary
Method Summary
void setPos(int x,int y) 设置位置.
void setProduct(Product p) 设置有效反映的物体.
void setMonster(Monster m) 设置有效反映的怪物.
boolean isCollidingWithProduct() 是否碰撞物体.
void paint(Graphics g) 绘制道具陷阱.
void setFire() 开火.
void setAction() 动画处理.
void isCollidingWithButton() 是否碰到开关按钮.
void setSize(int width,int height) 设置子弹的大小.
void setAR(int ar) 射程的设置.
boolean isCollidingWithProduct() 与物体的碰撞.
boolean isCollidingWithMonster() 与怪物的碰撞.
void setFireForMonster() 设置怪物的开火.
void drawSubImage(Graphics g,int x,int y) 裁减绘制.
